Products.Description: Buy a Vip ticket to get access to exclusive benefits that only you the holder can benefit from.
Buy a backstage pass to get exclusive access to the backstage area, meet the bands and DJs and make some new friends.
This will allow you access to the club's main floor, bar and dance floor
Gift this pass to a friend (only available if you're in our vip subscriber program) and they'll be able to join you in the vip area for a night.
Become a Midnight Animal with this subscription. A monthly fee will be needed allows access to main floor, dance floor and bar with no need to buy tickets every night.
